item.title: ðŸ“Œ Thoughts
item.description: [03.02] Restore common sense The West was heading toward an authoritarian communism dystopia at ultra high speed before it was stopped by a massive US election victory. Trump and European right-wing leaders are literally saving the Western civilization from collapse. It seems that as human civilization becomes advanced, people lose common sense, stop respecting nature and become astonishingly ignorant. Paper straws are terrible; and why do they mandate vaccine injection into everyone’s body without considering any long-term danger?
